original_text: But you have done more evil things than any of the kings who lived before you. You have made me very angry. You have used metal to make images of other gods that you could worship. You have turned away from me.
korean_text: 네 이전 사람들보다도 더 악을 행하고 가서 너를 위하여 다른 신을 만들며 우상을 부어 만들어 나를 노엽게 하고 나를 네 등 뒤에 버렸도다

sentences.original_text: But you have done more evil things
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신은 더 많은 악한 일들을 저질렀습니다

sentences.original_text: than any of the kings who lived before you
You have made me very angry
You have used metal to make images of other gods
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 금속을 사용하여 다른 신들의 형상을 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: You have turned away from me
